activities: Personal Information received via our clients' websites use of Certona provided services in order to provide services to our clients and their customers. We may use this information to provide personalized recommendations or content on the web, mobile, email, or other delivery platforms. The Personal Information received by Certona is limited by applicable contracts and law. Certona may use Personal Information received for analytics, reporting, and other purposes which may change from time to time.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: Online non-Personally Identifying Information and limited Personally Identify Information as requested, and controlled by client contracts, through the Certona service. The Certona website (www.certona.com) only collects Personally Identifying Information that is voluntarily provided through forms presented to the user.
recoursemech: Certona agrees to utilize the American Arbitration Association (AAA) for all unresolved personal data complaints.
